snippet: Manchester United kept up its resurgent form with a 2-1 home win, with Juan Mata’s second-half goal securing United’s fourth straight Premier League victory.
abstract: Manchester United beats Stoke, 2-1, in England's Premier League soccer; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United kept up its resurgent form with a 2-1 home win, with Juan Mata’s second-half goal securing United’s fourth straight Premier League victory.

headline.print_headline: Manchester United Tops Stoke; Liverpool Wins
